n=as.integer(readline(prompt="Enter the number of elements in the array:"))
arr_1=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr_1[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
arr_2=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  arr_2[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter the value:"))
}
arr_1=sort(arr_1)
arr_2=sort(arr_2,decreasing=T)
c=array(0)
for(i in 1:3){
  c[i]=arr_1[i]*arr_2[i]
}
print(sum(c))
